meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>dormitory</kanji> <kanji>student</kanji> (comes from 学生) is a <vocabulary>boarding student</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>boarder</vocabulary>. This is a student who lives in a dormitory.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
